Package kademlia.util

Class RouteLengthChecker

java.lang.Object
kademlia.util.RouteLengthChecker
public class RouteLengthChecker
extends java.lang.Object
Class that helps compute the route length taken to complete an operation. Only used for routing operations - mainly the NodeLookup and ContentLookup Operations. Idea: - Add the original set of nodes with route length 0; - When we get a node reply with a set of nodes, we add those nodes and set the route length to their sender route length + 1
Since:
20140510

    • addInitialNodes

      public void addInitialNodes​(java.util.Collection<Node> initialNodes)
      Add the initial nodes in the routing operation

    • addNodes

      public void addNodes​(java.util.Collection<Node> inputSet, Node sender)
      Add any nodes that we get from a node reply. The route length of these nodes will be their sender + 1;
      Parameters:
      inputSet - The set of nodes we receive
      sender - The node who send the set

    • getRouteLength

      public int getRouteLength()
      Get the route length of the operation! It will be the max route length of all the nodes here.
      Returns:
      The route length
